menu.description: A rich and creamy espresso-based coffee topped with frothy milk foam.
A bold and intense shot of pure coffee goodness, perfect for the espresso purists.
Indulge in a decadent slice of moist chocolate cake, layered with velvety chocolate ganache.
Cool off with a refreshing glass of iced tea, infused with your choice of flavors.
Sip on a vibrant and refreshing fruit smoothie, bursting with natural flavors and nutrients.
